segments.text: I see the little girl standing there, so innocent and eager for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea about the danger her brother is in, just like the woman drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her open palm, reaching up towards the cookie jar, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so trusting, so sure that her brother will share with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must be excited about getting a cookie, completely oblivious to the water and the tipping stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of warmth seeing her like that, so carefree and happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what flavor the cookies are, that she's so eager to have one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her looking up at her brother, her eyes full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must really love cookies, to be so patient and hopeful like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her other arm is down by her side, just waiting for her brother to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm intruding on a sweet moment between siblings, even with the chaos around them.
segments.speaker: PAR
